short_summary: Purchase EDM - Electrical Discharge Machine wire type
description: This procurement is for the acquisition of an EDM \" Electrical Discharge Machine \" of the wire type.
tags: -Electrical and Electronic Equipment-E machinery and equipment-05.11.05

full_summary:
### Solicitation for Electrical Discharge Machine (EDM)

#### Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3602449334-Doc3703938046
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: 11 October 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 10 November 2022 at 14:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 9 January 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 May 2023

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Trade agreements applied to this tender include:
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Delivery Location**: Hamilton
* **End User**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Jessica Canas
	+ Email: jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Note: No phone or fax number available

#### Notice and Documents

* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334027?extsite=MTQzMzQwMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Attachments: None available.

#### Selection Criteria

* The lowest price will be the primary criterion for selection.

Please note that the discretion to reject any or all proposals has been granted to the contracting authority. All bids are subject to evaluation and selection based on the criteria stated in this solicitation.
